construct.name: Actor
construct.description: A concurrent, message-processing component of a parallel message-passing system. An actor can process messages, send messages, change local state, and create new actors.
construct.method: Allows the actor to process messages.
This method must be implemented by the user and specifies an actor’s “behavior” when processing messages. Messages are processed one at a time.
